description: AWS Cost Anomaly Detection leverages advanced Machine Learning technologies to identify anomalous spend and root causes, so you can quickly take action. Create subscription to be notified

Arn.markdownDescription:
Subscription ARN

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[-a-z0-9]*:[a-z0-9]+:[-a-z0-9]*:[0-9]{12}:[-a-zA-Z0-9/:_]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Address.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: (^[a-zA-Z0-9.!#$%&'*+=?^_‘{|}~-]+@[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+(\.[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)+$)|(^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*):sns:[a-zA-Z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+(\.fifo)?$)  
Update requires: No interruption

Status.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CONFIRMED | DECLINED  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: EMAIL | SNS  
Update requires: No interruption

Subscriber.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceTag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

Key.description: The key name for the tag.
Key.markdownDescription:
The key name for the tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:).*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
The value for the tag.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceTag.markdownDescription:
A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

SubscriptionName.markdownDescription:
The name of the subscription.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Pattern: [\S\s]*  
Update requires: No interruption

MonitorArnList.description: A list of cost anomaly monitors.
MonitorArnList.markdownDescription:
A list of cost anomaly monitors.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Subscribers.markdownDescription:
A list of subscriber

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Threshold.description: The dollar value that triggers a notification if the threshold is exceeded.
Threshold.markdownDescription:
The dollar value that triggers a notification if the threshold is exceeded. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Number  
Update requires: No interruption

Frequency.description: The frequency at which anomaly reports are sent over email.
Frequency.markdownDescription:
The frequency at which anomaly reports are sent over email. 

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: DAILY | IMMEDIATE | WEEKLY  
Update requires: No interruption

ResourceTags.markdownDescription:
Tags to assign to subscription.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

AccountId.markdownDescription:
The accountId

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1024  
Update requires: No interruption
